about.title: About Me
about.descFisrtParagraph: Full-Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience in web development.
about.descSecondParagraph: Focused on building scalable, secure, and maintainable applications, with attention to architecture, performance, and user experience.
about.descThirdParagraph: Interested in best development practices, clean code, and the continuous improvement of processes and tools in production environments.
about.descFourthParagraph: My goal is to build not just visually appealing websites, but systems that deliver concrete results such as improved user experience, optimized flows, and measurable business impact.

DevelopmentSteps.title: Development Steps
DevelopmentSteps.firstStepDesc: We start by organizing all the information and requirements of your project.
DevelopmentSteps.secondStepDesc: We define the requirements, deadlines, budget, and payment terms.
DevelopmentSteps.thirdStepDesc: This is where your idea becomes reality. You can navigate and evaluate the design.
DevelopmentSteps.fourthtepDesc: Now it's time to move to the development phase, where we bring your site to life through programming.
DevelopmentSteps.fifthhtepDesc: We reach the final phase, where your project will be delivered, fully functional and ready to use.

PromoteServices.title: Why Your Business Needs a Website
PromoteServices.desc: In an increasingly digital world, having a professional website is essential for the success of any business. But it's not just about having an online presence. A well-designed website is the gateway to your business, the showcase that presents your products or services to the world.

contact.title: Work With Me and Achieve Your Goals
contact.descFisrtParagraph: If you are looking for a reliable and experienced freelance web developer, contact me today. Let's discuss your needs and how I can help you achieve your online goals.
contact.descSecondParagraph: In addition to my technical skills, I am a proactive, organized professional with excellent communication. I believe in building a trusting relationship with my clients, so I dedicate myself to understanding your needs and expectations clearly and objectively.
contact.descThirdParagraph: Together, we can build a website that represents your business and helps you attract new clients and achieve online success.
